  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServerThreadingStrategy  
    SessionMode  
    TCPRegistry
    The TCPRegistry allows you to either provide a true host and port for example "localhost:8080" or if you would rather let the application allocate you a free port at random, you can just provide a text reference to the port, for example "host.port", you can provide any text you want, it will always be taken as a reference, that is unless its correctly formed like "<hostname>:<port>‚Äù, then it will use the exact host and port you provide.
    WanSimulator
